name: AxMessagesWidget
description: Displays messages to the user, for example to communicate validation results.

variant.description: A layout-variant code (preliminary; 1: no alert/border, 2: single alert, 3: one alert per error-class, 4: one alert per message).

dismiss.description: Tells if and how messages may be dismissed by the user.

enabled.description: If true, a button for dismissing is provided to the user.

status.description: Flags by which the most severe level among all messages is indicated.

reset.description: Delete all messages and set the state to BLANK

errors.description: If enabled, errors received via didEncounterError will be displayed too

resource.description: List of resources for which publish- and validation-messages are processed.

list.description: Resource topic list. Empty list serves as catch-all, null disables the resource-feature.

exclude.description: A list of resources to exclude from the display in case resource.list is set to catch-all.

replace.description: Whether to replace messages with success message.

i18n.description: Which locale to use for displaying this widget.

locale.description: The topic under which to expect the locale for this widget.
